english.segment1: It's late at night. I feel alone. The silence could not be louder. Where are you?. Will I ever know?. Or will I be forgotten?. The road I chose, has brought me loss. But there is hope for tomorrow. Broken down, but I'll stand. As I await your promise.
english.segment2: The warmth of the sun makes me smile. I can't wait for tomorrow. A new morning another try. Another chance to make this right.
